hero.title: Web developer and open source enthusiast
hero.description: I'm Estéban, a web developer based in Paris. I enjoy contributing to open source projects like Nuxt or UnJS and writing articles to share my experiences.

cards.title: Nuxt
cards.description: Nuxt is an open source framework that makes web development intuitive and powerful. Create performant and production-grade full-stack web apps and websites with confidence.

cards.title: UnJS
cards.description: Agnostic Excellence: JavaScript Libraries, Tools, and Utilities, Crafted to Elevate Your Coding Journey.

articles.title: My Latest Articles
articles.description: I write about web development, open source, and more.

hero.title: Welcome in my mind
hero.description: In a world of constant acceleration, it's essential to refocus on yourself and take a little time for a read. Here are some articles I've written.
